messages.message: Can also be a Messages Key. Message can contain "{playername}" for player related events.
Positive or negative amount which will be credited or debited to/from the team account.
Positive or negative effect on the appropriate player attribute.
Influences probability. 1 means standard probability; 5 means that probability of occuring is five times higher. 0 disables the event.
A random player will get injured
A random player will get blocked
A random player's happiness will be changed
A random player's fitness will be changed
A random player's stamina will be changed
